revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife}} '''A_SpectralBigBallLightning'''
(''no parameter'')
Fires 3 {{Class|SpectralLightningH3}} projectiles ahead and to the left and right of the calling actor. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SpectralLightningBigBall1}} and derived classes.
